statements: SELECT * FROM nft_marketplace_prices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT nft_name, price FROM nft_marketplace_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT nft_name, price FROM nft_marketplace_prices WHERE price < 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT nft_name, price, purchase_date FROM nft_marketplace_prices WHERE nft_id = 3;
SELECT nft_id, nft_name, price, purchase_date FROM nft_marketplace_prices ORDER BY nft_id ASC;
SELECT nft_name, price FROM nft_marketplace_prices WHERE nft_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_marketplace_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT nft_id, nft_name, price, purchase_date FROM nft_marketplace_prices WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY nft_name ASC;
SELECT nft_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM nft_marketplace_prices GROUP BY nft_name HAVING avg_price > 500 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT nft_id, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM nft_marketplace_prices GROUP BY nft_id HAVING max_price < 1000 ORDER BY max_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFTs;
SELECT nft_name, nft_price FROM NFTs ORDER BY nft_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE buyer='Alice';
SELECT nft_name, creator FROM NFTs WHERE nft_price > 100 ORDER BY nft_price;
SELECT nft_name, transaction_amount FROM NFTs JOIN Transactions ON NFTs.id = Transactions.nft_id;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE nft_price > 1000
SELECT nft_name, nft_price FROM NFTs ORDER BY nft_price DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM Transactions
SELECT nft_name, creator FROM NFTs WHERE creator = 'Alice'
SELECT nft_name, transaction_amount FROM NFTs JOIN Transactions ON NFTs.id = Transactions.nft_id
SELECT * FROM nft_marketplace_prices;
SELECT nft_name, price FROM nft_marketplace_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT owner_name, nft_name FROM nft_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT nft_name, category FROM nft_metadata WHERE category = 'Art';
SELECT * FROM nft_owners WHERE ownership_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM nft_marketplace_prices ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT nft_name, price FROM nft_marketplace_prices WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT nft_name, price, transaction_date FROM nft_marketplace_prices JOIN nft_metadata ON nft_marketplace_prices.id = nft_metadata.nft_id;
SELECT owner_name, nft_name FROM nft_owners JOIN nft_metadata ON nft_owners.nft_id = nft_metadata.nft_id WHERE ownership_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT owner_name, COUNT(nft_id) AS number_of_nfts_owned FROM nft_owners GROUP BY owner_name HAVING COUNT(nft_id) > 1 ORDER BY number_of_nfts_owned DESC;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Collection;
SELECT nft_name, artist_name FROM NFT_Collection WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT nft_id, nft_name, artist_name, release_date FROM NFT_Collection ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT nft_name, price FROM NFT_Collection JOIN NFT_Price_History ON NFT_Collection.nft_id = NFT_Price_History.nft_id;
SELECT nft_name, tag_name FROM NFT_Collection JOIN NFT_Tags ON NFT_Collection.nft_id = NFT_Tags.nft_id WHERE tag_name = 'digital';
SELECT * FROM NFT_Collection
SELECT nft_name, artist_name FROM NFT_Collection ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT nft_name, price FROM NFT_Collection JOIN NFT_Price_History ON NFT_Collection.nft_id = NFT_Price_History.nft_id WHERE price > 500.00
SELECT nft_name, tag_name FROM NFT_Tags JOIN NFT_Collection ON NFT_Tags.nft_id = NFT_Collection.nft_id WHERE tag_name = 'Digital Art'
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(nft_id) as num_owned FROM NFT_Ownership GROUP BY owner_id HAVING num_owned > 3
SELECT * FROM NFTUser;
SELECT username, email FROM NFTUser WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT collection_name, total_items FROM NFTCollection ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT item_name, current_price FROM NFTItem WHERE collection_id = 2 AND current_price > 100.00;
SELECT sale_date, sale_price FROM NFTSale ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFTCollection;
SELECT collection_id, collection_name, total_items FROM NFTCollection ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT collection_name, COUNT(*) as total_items FROM NFTCollection GROUP BY collection_name HAVING total_items > 10;
SELECT item_name, current_price, created_at FROM NFTItem WHERE current_price > 1000 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM NFTUser WHERE joined_on BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
